channel.title: Virtualisation on SPARCies site
channel.description: Recent content in Virtualisation on SPARCies site

item.title: Why KVM?
item.description:
Why use KVM?

Due to the Big.Little-like architecture of the 12th gen core-CPU’s most other hypervisors (like ESXi and Xen/XCP-NG) cannot use all cores.
item.content:
Why use KVM?

Due to the Big.Little-like architecture of the 12th gen core-CPU’s most other hypervisors (like ESXi and Xen/XCP-NG) cannot use all cores.
